website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive option for a manual orthodontic toothbrush that's designed to reach under wires.
pros: Has a design with inner and outer bristles of different lengths, which allows them to remove food particles around and under brackets and arch wires
Also ships with 15 flossers designed specifically for use with braces
cons: Not as effective on braces as an electric toothbrush or water flosser

customer_reviews.title: Not very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: The toothbrush is ok...but won't sit flat on the counter and the bristles are anything but soft. The teeth cleaners are worthless...the pokers hurt and the floss is loose and floppy.
customer_reviews.author: L Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Got these flossers for my 12 yr old son, ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these flossers for my 12 yr old son, they work very well. No more of "threading" those long pieces of plastic under the wires!
customer_reviews.author: ElaineS

customer_reviews.title: Okay product for price.
customer_reviews.text: Overall okay product for price. Bristles on the toothbrush wore down and separated pretty early on thought. Floss picks seem to work well but for me hurt too much. Sticking with water pick.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazing .....the perfect kit for my braces, especially the flossers. I should've bought two
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the flossers are perfect for the braces wearer in the family. Fits easily under wires and between teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Temple

customer_reviews.title: Bought this toothbrush for my son, he definitely loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this toothbrush for my son, he definitely loves it! Will be ordering another one since I will be getting braces soon!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha J.

customer_reviews.title: Flossers are great for braces too
customer_reviews.text: Son says these brushes really make brushing with braces a lot easier, Flossers are great for braces too.
customer_reviews.author: Heather TenKley

customer_reviews.title: Decent set but do not like brush
customer_reviews.text: Love that I was able to try to picks and toothbrush without purchasing them separately but I did not really care for the toothbrush. It was prickly and hurt my gums. I have braces but also have perio issues. The picks are so easy for someone who has so much trouble flossing with braces and is lazy but I wish both sides were thin so that you could use each side of the thread.
customer_reviews.author: lalaorganic

customer_reviews.title: Great item at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great item at reasonable price. Orthodontic toothbrushes and flossers are difficult to find in regular stores; great to have Amazon to turn to!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Morris

customer_reviews.title: These flossers are great for her
customer_reviews.text: My 9-year-old daughter just got braces and is having a difficult time with brushing and flossing. These flossers are great for her. I doubt we would be flossing without them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy R.

customer_reviews.title: They work!!
customer_reviews.text: These flossers are amazing! They are small enough on the one end to get under my daughter’s braces and saves so much time frustration. We tried another brand of flossers for braces, but they were too big to fit under the wire. The Platypus fits under wires beautifully. So thankful my dental hygienist told me about them. My daughter’s orthodontist never told me about them so it makes me wonder how many orthodontists really know about them. If the Platypus company would like to hire me (a hygienist) to visit orthodontist offices and promote their product, I would be a great spokesperson. These things work! Call me, Platypus. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Bagwell

product_meta.title: Platypus Ortho Toothbrush And Ortho Flossers For Braces - Platy Pak (Pack Of 1)
product_meta.description: Is EASY! Increases flossing compliance up to 80% · Is SAFE! Patent pending structure uses the tooth’s anatomy to floss correctly, eliminating worry of damaging wires and brackets while flossing. · Is QUICK! No threading required, you can floss your entire mouth in less than 2 minutes. · Is UNIQUE! The only flosser with the innovative structure which fits under the arch wire, between teeth, and up into the gum line. Toothbrush Designed to be effective when used in a manner that most patients actually use a toothbrush. Eliminates re-training! Inner bristles 2mm shorter for better adaptation over brackets and archwires. Inner MEDIUM bristles assist with better cleaning of stainless or resin appliances. SOFT outer bristles angled/curved inwards. This assists in bristles folding inwards, focusing on areas where the brackets meet the anatomy as well as behind the archwires. This is the area where over 85% of decalcification and decay occur while wearing braces. Affordable! Silicone grips designed for maximum comfort and ease of use.
